name: Jason Lee
persona: Jason Lee is a 20-year-old Business Administration major who has struggled academically, reflected in his current CGPA of 1.43. While he experiences relatively low test anxiety, his motivation, self-discipline, and belief in his academic abilities are currently low. Jason often finds it challenging to stay organized and persist through setbacks, but he remains hopeful about finding strategies to improve his performance. He enjoys the social aspects of university life and is seeking ways to boost his engagement with coursework.
